result.title: Level 1 sheet #1
result.content:
-- problem A. Next Round

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define long long ll
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    
    //A. Next Round
    int n,k;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
    int x[n];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%d",&x[i]);
        }

    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        if(x[i]>=x[k-1]&&x[i]>0)
            ans++;

           }
    printf("%d",ans);
    return 0;
}

-- problem B. Team

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define long long ll
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    int x[3];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        for(int j=0;j<3;j++){
            scanf("%d",&x[j]);
        }
        if(x[0]+x[1]+x[2]>=2)
        ans++;

    }
    printf("%d",ans);

    
    return 0;
}

-- problem C. Domino piling

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define long long ll
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int n,m ;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
    printf("%d",(n*m)/2);

    return 0;
}

-- problem D. Soldier and Bananas

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int  k,n,w;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&k,&n,&w);
    long long t=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=w;i++){
        t+=(i*k);
    }
    t-=n;
    if(t<0)
        printf("0");
    else
    printf("%lld",t);

    return 0;
}

-- problem E. Elephant

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define long long ll
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int n,x ;
    cin>>n;
    x=n/5;
    if(n%5!=0)
      x++;
    cout<<x<<endl;
    
    return 0;
}

-- problem F. Soft Drinking

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define ll long long 
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int n,k,l,c,d,p,nl,np;
    scanf("%d%d%d%d%d%d%d%d",&n,&k,&l,&c,&d,&p,&nl,&np);
    k*=l;
    c*=d;
    k/=nl;
    p/=np;
    printf("%d\n",(min(k,min(p,c)))/n);
    return 0;
}

-- problem G. sum to n

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int  n ;
    ll sum =0;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
        sum+=i;
    }
    printf("%lld",sum);

}

-- problem H. large sum

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int  n ,x;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    ll sum=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
        scanf("%d",&x);
        sum+=x;
    }
    printf("%lld",sum);
    return 0;
}

-- problem I. Expression

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int x,y,z,t=0;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&x,&y,&z);
    if(t<x+y+z)t=x+y+z;
    if(t<(x+y)*z)t=(x+y)*z;
    if(t<y*z*x)t=y*z*x;
    if(t<x*(y+z))t=x*(y+z);
    if(t<x+y*z)t=x+y*z;
    printf("%d",t);
    return 0;
}

-- problem J. King Moves

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define long long ll
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    char a;
    int x;
    scanf("%c%d",&a,&x);
    if(a>'a'&&a<'h'&&x>1&&x<8)printf("8");
    else if(a=='a'&&x>1&&x<8)printf("5");
    else if(a=='a'&&(x==1||x==8))printf("3");
    else if(a=='h'&&x>1&&x<8)printf("5");
    else if(a=='h'&&(x==1||x==8))printf("3");
    else printf("5");
    return 0;
}

-- problem K. Toy Army

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

int main()

-- problem L. Roma and Lucky Numbers

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int n,f;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&f);
    int  x;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%d",&x);
        int s=0;
        while(x>0){
            if (x%10==4||x%10==7){
                s++;
            }
            x/=10;
            }
        if(s<=f)
            ans++;
        }
    printf("%d",ans);
    return 0;
}

-- problem M. Jamie and Alarm Snooze

Code
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define long long ll
using namespace std;
//ismaele_atala
int ans =0;

int main()
{
    int x,h,m;
    bool t=0;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&x,&h,&m);
    while(h%10!=7&&m%10!=7)
    {
        if(m-x>=0){
            m-=x;
            ans++;
            }
        else{
            m+=60;
            m-=x;
            ans++;
            if(h==0)
                h=23;
            else
                h--;
            }
    }
    printf("%d",ans);
    return 0;
}
